about_the_game:
This software will be a collection of music data suitable for expressing a summery world view, created to the standards of "RPG Maker MZ" and "RPG Maker MV".

List of songs

Included in ogg / m4a / mp3 / wav format.

＜Features＞
BGM and SE that make you feel summer.
The sound of RPGs from the 90's to the 00's is included.

<Set Contents＞

BGM: 18
BGS: 1
SE: 23

*******************************************

BGM_02_opening_bpm140
